title: My FPS has suddenly dropped!
body:
As of today i logged onto league got into a game and noticed my fps was at anywhere from 5-30 fps which is simply unplayable, i normally have around 150fps this is on max settings(FPS was consistent across other graphical settings), i was hoping to know if anyone else has had a similar problem and/or knows how to solve it.

I have global settings set to nvidia gpu, and have latest GPU drivers BTW

i am on a laptop 
specs are:
Intel Core i7-5500U 2.4ghz Turbo 3.1ghz
Nvidia Geforce GT840m
8GB DDR3L ram

I do not believe this is a fault on my GPU as my CPU should be able to handle the game at medium settings 60+ fps.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the [Low FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
